rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance hall with wide door and ramp for wheelchair access, designed following Vastu principles with proper direction alignment.
Open plan living area integrated with dining space. Designed as a multifunctional zone for daily activities, ensuring ample natural light and good ventilation.
Modern kitchen layout following local norms with proper ventilation and Vastu-friendly placement of cooking appliances towards the east.
G+1 studio apartment integrated with a bedroom space, equipped with ample built-in storage and wheelchair accessible features including grab bars in bathroom areas.
Dedicated home theater area with soundproofing and appropriate lighting for immersive experience. Designed to be accessible with comfortable seating arrangements and clear pathways.
Quiet library space designed with adequate shelving, natural light, and comfortable seating. Accessible to wheelchair users ensuring ease of movement.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with safety features such as grab bars, non-slip flooring and easy-to-use fixtures. Designed according to local building codes.

openings.description: Widened main entrance door with ramp access ensuring easy wheelchair entry, positioned in the south-east as per Vastu recommendations.
Multiple windows installed to enhance natural ventilation and lighting. Placed primarily on north and east walls for optimal sunlight.
Balcony opening designed with safety railings and accessible steps or ramp for wheelchair users, providing an outdoor space view.

notes.text: Design adheres to Indian local building norms and Vastu principles. All areas are designed with wheelchair accessibility in mind including ramps, wider corridors, and grab bars in necessary rooms.

The layout includes distinct zones for industrial aesthetics combined with a comfortable living environment in the studio apartment. The design emphasizes functionality, safety, and energy efficiency.
